title: Not loading?
body:
I'm having issues loading the game from champion select to the game itself, it just says the game has crashed?

- New computer and new download of the game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Is windows up to date? Have you updated all your relevant drivers (GPU, etc)?
Do you have lolreplay or another third party application that interfaces with the game installed?
